name: Hawthorne: Shadow Hunter (Prototype)
description:
W/A/S/D or Arrow Keys to Move. Click, Tap or Use Enter Key to Interact.
Alternatively, Use Directional Pad on the bottom left for movement.

If game is cut off via viewport, go Fullscreen by hitting the Icon on the lower right.

My own RPGMakerMV / MV3D Sketchpad, currently done:

  • Traffic System, with an active pedestrian crossing and collision.
  • Time/Date System that can either run in custom or realtime mode.

Not a functional game per se (as yet). Don't intend to keep a dev log, as updates will be infrequent and i may or may not finish the game.

WARNING: Game might run poorly on Firefox browsers (FPS tanks), but should do fine on Chromium based browsers.
